sentences.en: Afterchloroform was evaporated , it was used as chelate complex chromatographic stationary phase to purify puerarin extractive.
sentences.cn: 建立了采用配位色谱柱从葛根素浸膏中分离纯化葛根素的方法.

sentences.en: An extractant - screening method with a vapor - liquid equilibrium apparatus in the extractive distillation was introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了萃取精馏萃取剂的一种实验筛选方法,汽液平衡仪直接法.

sentences.en: CONCLUSIONA new extractive procedure of solanesol from tobacco extract is established.
sentences.cn: 结论建立的新方法简便易行.

sentences.en: Conservationist tenant preferred, but extractive forestry also considered.
sentences.cn: 保育人士优先考虑, 但采掘业也会考虑.

sentences.en: Extractive distillation is an important separation process in chemical industry.
sentences.cn: 萃取精馏是化学工业中重要的分离方法之一.

sentences.en: Extractive industry, however, is not confined to the extraction of materials.
sentences.cn: 不过, 采掘业并不限于采掘原料.

sentences.en: Is extractive metallurgy different from process metallurgy?
sentences.cn: 提取冶金学和过程冶金学有什么不同 吗 ?

sentences.en: It was found that all extractive of chilli seed have strong anti - oxidative effects for lard.
sentences.cn: 用不同溶剂提取辣椒籽中的抗氧化物质,采用碘量法研究辣椒籽提取物对猪油的抗氧化作用.

sentences.en: METHODS: Its optimal extractive condition was found by right - cross test.
sentences.cn: 方法: 用正交试验法得到最佳提取条件.

sentences.en: Molecular design for extractive distillation could decrease experimental working.
sentences.cn: 萃取精馏的分子设计能够减少实验工作量.

sentences.en: Objective : To explore the anti - inflammatory and analgesic effects of Ganoderma lucidum extractive.
sentences.cn: 目的研究灵芝提取物的镇痛与 抗炎 作用.

sentences.en: The beautiful artistic design and extractive casting skills are fantastic.
sentences.cn: 完美的艺术选型和精细的铸造技术犹如梦幻一般.

sentences.en: The industrial application of a new benzene extractive distillation technology on reforming plant is presented.
sentences.cn: 报道了苯抽提蒸馏技术新工艺在连续重整工业装置上的应用.

sentences.en: The methods of microwave extraction , ultrasonic extraction, supercritical extraction were superior to the traditional extractive techniques.
sentences.cn: 同传统的提取技术相比,微波 、 超声 、 超临界等提取技术有着不可比拟的优越性.

sentences.en: The synergic extraction is main to from multicomponent complex of mixed ligand in extractive separation.
sentences.cn: 溶剂萃取分离中的协同萃取,是形成混配多元络合物的主要表现.

words.tran_cn: 提取的；可萃取的；精萃的

trans.tran_cn: 引得出的，抽取的，萃取的

trans.tran_en: something extracted or capable of being extracted
